section.p: The Family History Section contains information about the genetic family members, to the extent that they are known, the diseases they suffered from, their ages at death, and other relevant genetic information.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Family Medical History Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.14)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Family History (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.18)

SHALL conform to IHE Coded Family History Section and SHALL contain a templateId element whose root attribute is 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.15 when this section is conveying structured family history.
When providing structured Family History Information SHALL include entries conforming to the Family History module
SHALL conform to CCD Family History Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.4)
SHALL conform to IHE Family Medical History Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.14)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="10157-6" History of family member diseases (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-185, CONF-186)

MAY contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Family History Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.23)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Family History (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.18)

SHOULD satisfy: Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive text string containing 'family history'. (CONF-188)
UNIMPLEMENTABLE

Family History Section SHOULD include one or more family history observations (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.22), which MAY be contained within family history organizers (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.23) (CONF-184)
[OCL]: self.entry.observation->exists(obs : cda::Observation | obs.oclIsTypeOf(ccd::FamilyHistoryObservation)) or self.entry.organizer->exists(org : cda::Organizer | org.oclIsTypeOf(ccd::FamilyHistoryOrganizer))

The family history section SHALL NOT contain Section / subject. (CONF-189)
[OCL]: self.subject.oclIsUndefined()

SHALL conform to IHE Coded Family History Section and SHALL contain a templateId element whose root attribute is 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.15 when this section is conveying structured family history.
When providing structured Family History Information SHALL include entries conforming to the Family History module
